name: websocket-demo
description: WebSocket server and React client demo projects

scripts.setup: npm run build:types && npm run install:server && npm run install:client
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail -c "blue,green,yellow" -n "types,server,client" "npm run start:types" "npm run start:server" "npm run start:client"
scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.clean: npm run clean:types && npm run clean:server && npm run clean:client
